messages.content: ComfyUI-CogVideoX-MZ is a model loader for CogVideoX-5B in ComfyUI.
What is the dependency for ComfyUI-CogVideoX-MZ?
Where can the CogVideoX_5b_fp8_4em.safetensors model be downloaded?

The CogVideoX_5b_fp8_4em.safetensors model can be downloaded from https://modelscope.cn/models/wailovet/CogVideoX-5b/resolve/master/CogVideoX_5b_fp8_4em.safetensors and should be placed in the unet folder.
Where can the diffusion_pytorch_model.safetensors model be downloaded?

The diffusion_pytorch_model.safetensors model can be downloaded from https://modelscope.cn/models/zhipuai/cogvideox-5b/resolve/master/vae/diffusion_pytorch_model.safetensors and should be placed in the vae folder. Remember to rename the file for easy identification.
Where can the t5xxl_fp8_e4m3fn.safetensors model be downloaded?

The t5xxl_fp8_e4m3fn.safetensors model can be downloaded from https://modelscope.cn/models/ai-modelscope/flux_text_encoders/resolve/master/t5xxl_fp8_e4m3fn.safetensors and should be placed in the clip folder. It is compatible with sd3/flux and does not need to be downloaded again if already available.
Where can the workflow for ComfyUI-CogVideoX-MZ be found?
The workflow for ComfyUI-CogVideoX-MZ can be found in the examples/workflow.png file.
Yes, the t5xxl_fp8_e4m3fn.safetensors model used in ComfyUI-CogVideoX-MZ is compatible with sd3/flux.
